trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to the tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when it matches a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados enviados para o serviço de controlo a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução quando corresponder uma <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It is also used in the return list of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents*> property.
trans-unit.target: Também é utilizado na lista de retorno de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends a WorkflowTrackingRecord to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução corresponde a um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>num <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, envia um WorkflowTrackingRecord para o serviço de controlo sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>associados a esse serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service can perform whatever action is necessary on the data in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de controlo pode efetuar qualquer ação é necessária nos dados no registo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução do controlo de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> value, <xref:System.DateTime>, number, and <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"> </xref> valor <xref:System.DateTime>, o número e o <xref:System.EventArgs>.</xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: `eventDateTime` is expressed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: `eventDateTime`é expressa na hora Universal Coordenada (UTC).

trans-unit.source: `eventOrder` is guaranteed to be unique within the workflow instance; however, it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: `eventOrder`é garantido de ser exclusivos numa instância de fluxo de trabalho; No entanto, não é garantido ser sequenciais.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução do controlo de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the date and time of the workflow status event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>que indica a data e hora do evento de estado de fluxo de trabalho associado com o registo de controlo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The relative order in which the workflow status event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A ordem relativa na qual o evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho associado a este registo de controlo ocorreu na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs"></xref>, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: É um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs"> </xref>, um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs"> </xref>, um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs"> </xref>, ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref> that was matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"> </xref> foi correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é definida pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"> </xref> que contém as anotações que estão associadas a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains additional data associated with certain types of workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém dados adicionais associados a determinados tipos de eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For most workflow status events, EventArgs is a null reference (`Nothing`); however, for certain kinds of workflow status events the runtime tracking infrastructure uses EventArgs to return additional data about the workflow status event.
trans-unit.target: Para a maior parte dos eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho, EventArgs é uma referência nula (`Nothing`); no entanto, para determinados tipos de eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho da infraestrutura de runtime de controlo utiliza EventArgs devolver dados adicionais sobre o evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that correspond to these special workflow status events and the type of object returned in EventArgs for each of these workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores que correspondem a estes eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho especiais e o tipo de objecto devolvido em EventArgs para cada um destes eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> Value|EventArgs Object| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>| This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: | Valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| Objeto de EventArgs | |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>| Esta propriedade é definida pelo controlo a infraestrutura de runtime.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs"></xref>, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: É um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs"> </xref>, um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs"> </xref>, um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs"> </xref>, ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time that the workflow tracking event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e hora em que ocorreu o evento de controlo de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>é de hora Universal Coordenada (UTC).</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é definida pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the date and time that the workflow status event occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>que indica a data e hora em que ocorreu o evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the workflow status event that matched the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem na instância de fluxo de trabalho do evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho que correspondeu a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: EventOrder indicates the relative order in the workflow instance of the workflow status event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: EventOrder indica a ordem relativa na instância de fluxo de trabalho do evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho que correspondeu à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: EventOrder is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: EventOrder é exclusivo dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas não é garantido ser sequenciais.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é definida pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order of the workflow status event in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem do evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of workflow status event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho associado com o registo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: `TrackingWorkflowEvent` contains one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values indicating the kind of workflow status event that was matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to be sent.
trans-unit.target: `TrackingWorkflowEvent`contém uma do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores que indica o tipo de evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho que foi correspondido a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução e causou o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>seja enviado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: It reflects the current status of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Este reflete o estado atual da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits workflow status events only when the status of the workflow instance changes, and, therefore, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can be matched only when a workflow status change occurs.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho apenas quando o estado da instância do fluxo de trabalho é alterada e, por conseguinte, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido apenas quando ocorre uma alteração de estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é definida pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"> </xref> valores.
